item.title: A Fo0od waste bin and contents tipped on the side of the road, 24th March
item.description:
The Location is the Aggs Hill Road where it meets the Cotswold Way footpath just under the trees. The Food Waste Bin is on the right hand side going towards the Burnt Oak Crossroads. Also between the Cotaswold Way Footpath Entrance and the Burnt Oak - mainly on the Right Hand side is a quantity of rubbish all along the verge (some both sides of the road. Please can this be cleared up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Massive Potholes, 21st March
item.description:

item.title: Dog poo bin nears empyting, 21st March
item.description:
Hi Please can you arrange for this dog poo bin? It’s the one off Moorend Road (but not the one by the road) nearer the back of Charlton Park on the green. Thank you! Sarah

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 47 King William Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green Light not working, 20th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hubble Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Street sign defaced, 20th March
item.description:
The street sign for Castanum Court has been defaced with black spray paint so that the name is partly obscured
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Castanum Court, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant Littering in carpark, 20th March
item.description:
There is constant littering in the little carpark on Falkland Place, to the side of 116 Hesters Way Rd. Rubbish currently consists of filled dog poo bags, tea towels, toilet rolls (?) and various other items. Issue has been reported numetous times to CBH as most is due to a tenant of theirs but the problem persists. It's really awful and embarrassing at the moment so I would be very grateful if it could be cleared up. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 114 Hester's Way Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
